column2: 15. If your front wheels start to skid, the first thing you should do is:

column2: 26. To keep your vehicle from rolling into traffic when parked on a hill, if you are facing uphill you should:
column4: turn the back wheels towards the curb or edge of the road.

column2: 39. If you drink alcohol socially, what helps insure safe driving?
column4: Take a cold shower before driving.
